useCase.name: Get Developer Issues

preconditions.precondition: Developer requests to retrieve issues for a project.

useCase.trigger: Developer initiates the request to get developer issues for a specific project.

mainSequence.step: Developer requests issues for a specific project.
System checks if the developer is a member of the project.
System retrieves developer-specific issues for the project.
System provides the developer with a list of issues in the form of IssueResponseDto.
